name: Der Lichtpeter
goal:
The focus of Der Lichtpeter lies in the determination of optical light flicker.
This very important technical property of a luminous means needs paying more attention in view of the growth rates of flickering illuminants in the market.
The Lichtpeter works as a consultant for the benefit of humans.
Der Lichtpeter provides clarification and information to manufacturers, vendors and end-consumers.
